doc.title: English Transport 'Arundel Castle' Leaving for the Transvaal with British Troops
doc.plot: Her decks are crowded with an enthusiastic assembly of British soldiers, waving adieus to friends and dear ones they are leaving behind. The nation's colors at the stern show in whose cause these brave fellows are risking their lives and limbs. This picture never fails to deeply impress any observer with any loyalty in his veins.
